amendment.description: Amendment requires regional fishery management councils to include in their fishery management plans measures that would minimize, to the extent practicable, any adverse impact of fishing on essential fish habitat.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require regional fishery management councils to include in their fishery management plans measures that would minimize, to the extent practicable, any adverse impact of fishing on essential fish habitat.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 162 (Roll no. 717).
